synopsis.text: After establishing himself as the fastest delivery driver on Mt. Akina's treacherous mountain roads, high school student Takumi Fujiwara finds himself thrust into the world of competitive street racing. He receives a challenge from Ryousuke Takahashi, the legendary former "White Comet of Akagi" and leader of the elite RedSuns racing team. Though initially reluctant, Takumi is excited by the prospect of testing his skills against such a renowned racer. In preparation for their fateful duel, Ryousuke makes the bold decision to downgrade his Mazda RX-7, putting his reputation on the line. For Takumi, this is the biggest race of his life - a chance to prove he has what it takes to be considered the fastest street racer in Gunma. As the two drivers line up at the starting line, engines revved and tensions high, it's clear much more than just a local title is at stake. This thrilling race is the culmination of Takumi's swift rise from humble tofu delivery driver to taking on some of the most skilled racers around. With the support of friends, though at odds with balancing his personal life, Takumi faces his ultimate test against the legendary Ryousuke. Will his trusty Toyota AE86, the pride of Mt. Akina's late-night racing scene, have enough horsepower to defeat Ryousuke's finely tuned Mazda RX-7 FC? The stage is set for a dramatic and pivotal showdown.
